english.segment1: Words so secure screaming like an alarm. Are you trying to wake me up. Now what was that you were trying to pull. Is it my arm. I do believe you're trying to wake me up
english.segment2: (2x). But could it be maybe. It's not me sleeping. Could it be maybe you awakening
english.segment3: Sleep this time tonight. Sleepwalk in the light. Sleep this time tonight (one day we'll). Sleepwalk out of sight
english.segment4: Now here I am, but I'm just sleepwalking. Yes here I stand. But I guess I'm just sleeptalking for myself
english.segment5: But could it be maybe. It's not me sleeping. Could it be maybe you awakening
english.segment6: Sleep this time tonight. Sleepwalk in the light. Sleep this time tonight (one day we'll). Sleepwalk out of sight
english.segment7: One day this world will see me at the horizon. One day from a distant light. And just before I stand to face my love. I'll turn around. And with a smile I'll say my goodbyes. Just one last goodbye. Goodbye.
